title: Personal Data Protection Design Strategies in e-Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning experience and understanding of personal information concepts
context.additional_context: Practical-focused learning of data protection issues when utilizing e-learning platforms in science-related vocational training programs

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three types of personal data collected in e-learning systems and their potential risks
Learners can implement e-learning content design scenarios applying data protection principles in simulated environments
Learners can create an e-learning platform evaluation checklist reflecting personal information processing policies for project submissions
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
